entry.title: April 2018 Minutes
entry.content: Our adopted parent committee minutes will be posted here each month. You can view or download using the controls below.

entry.title: How to Unsubscribe
entry.content: If, for any reason, you’d like to unsubscribe from our mailing list you may do so here. See these screenshots if you have any trouble.

entry.title: Live Oak District Day Camp 2018
entry.content: The Live Oak District Day Camp will be a fun and educational time for the kids and also fulfills one aspect of the Cub Scout Outdoor Activity Award!

entry.title: Magazines
entry.content: Boys Life Magazine http://boyslife.org/ Games, articles, fun projects, hobbies, sports, pictures and more for scouts and adults too! Scouts that get Boys Life are more likely to stay involved with scouting.

entry.title: Pinewood Derby
entry.content: Official Pinewood Derby Website Pack 91 Rules 2018 Live Oak District Rules 2018

entry.title: Scout Camps
entry.content: Rancho Alegre - Los Padres Council Rancho Alegre Camp Map Outdoor School GPS Waypoint KMZ File Link to Google Map Rancho Alegre Camp Map Outdoor School GPS Waypoint KMZ File Less than an hour from the Santa Maria Valley, Rancho Alegre is right in our backyard.

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.content: Thanks for stopping by to learn more about Cub Scout Pack 91 in Orcutt, CA! Please check back here often and make sure to subscribe to our new calendar.

entry.title: Events Calendar
entry.content: Occasionally we’ll list community events here that are not sponsored by Pack 91. Those events will begin with [COMMUNITY].

entry.title: March 2018 Minutes
entry.content: Our adopted parent committee minutes will be posted here each month. You can view or download using the controls below.

entry.title: Parent Committee
entry.content: Parent committee meetings are normally held the second Sunday of each month from 6:30-8:00PM at Gloria Dei Lutheran Church. Dates may change so please refer to our events calendar and subscribe to our email list.

entry.title: How to Join
entry.content: Anytime is a great time to join Pack 91! Contact us to find out about our next Pack activity, and how you can join us.

entry.title: Contact
entry.content: Contact pack leaders through the Pack phone number: (805) 253-CUBS Send us a message through our Facebook page.

entry.title: About Our Pack
entry.content: Cub Scout Pack 91, Orcutt, is a family-friendly Scouting group. We strive to provide a complete Cub Scout experience to our scouts.
